sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-team-add',
  templateUrl: './team-add.page.html',
  styleUrls: ['./team-add.page.scss'],
})
export class TeamAddPage implements OnInit {

  constructor() { }

  ngOnInit() {
  }

}
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-title>team-add</ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content>
  <form [formGroup]="teamForm" (ngSubmit)="onFormSubmit()">
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Name</ion-label>
      <ion-input formControlName="name" type="text" required></ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Region</ion-label>
      <ion-input formControlName="region" type="text" required>
      </ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Position</ion-label>
      <ion-input formControlName="position" type="number" required>
      </ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <ion-row>
      <ion-col>
        <ion-button type="submit" color="primary" shape="full" expand="block">Add Team</ion-button>
      </ion-col>
    </ion-row>
  </form>
</ion-content>
